titleStmt.title: The voice of the people for a king shewing the only way for the future settlement and peace of England, humbly presented to His Excellency the Lord General Monck / by Arise Evans.
titleStmt.author: Evans, Arise, b. 1607.
Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
